name: Welcome | Oudom Lim

projects.title: Eventstar
projects.description: A cloud-driven, B2C event management solution that enables organizations to efficiently organize, oversee, and sell event tickets, while also monitoring key metrics. Additionally, it offers a smooth and intuitive interface for consumers to find and buy tickets for various events.

projects.title: Ã‰clair-Mania
projects.description: Ã‰clair-Mania is a Java-based maze game created with JDK 11, offering players a challenging dungeon escape scenario. Throughout the game, players confront various enemies and must use strategy and skill to overcome them. By collecting resources and constructing tools, players enhance their abilities to navigate through complex mazes.

projects.title: Streams
projects.description: A communication tool written in Python that gives user the ability to message on another as well as create channels for collaborations. Features here are akin to similar existing applications such as Microsoft Teams and Discord.

projects.title: AirBrb
projects.description: A basic frontend implementation of the popular app AirBnB, this implementation contains the fundamental logic in AirBnB but with different designs taken and modified from MaterialUI

projects.title: Chicken Archiver
projects.description: A file archiver purely written in C to create and extract archives, this app also supports various file operations, such as permission and size listing, and performs data validation to ensure archive integrity.

aboutpara: I am a recent UNSW graduate and a lover of learning and technology. I've worked across diverse fields from AI to Cybersecurity. Beyond tech, I'm into perfecting my craft through BJJ, Muay Thai, Boxing, and weightlifting. I find that keeping active helps me not only physically but also improves my mood and mental clarity.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
